title: How to record a PC (laptop) screen activity (Record Screen) 2020 - Quora

response.answer_text: All you need is a screen recorder. 2020 is a year when the screen recorder sees its summit. Now I recommend to you several good screen recorders that share a boost in 2020. The first one: Xbox Game Bar  Easy to call out, uncluttered interface, latent software that works in the background. Although the latest version has caused some trouble for gamers. The second one: RecMaster  RecMaster is also an easy-to-operate screen recorder that helps users to capture activities on their desktop. Recordings are promised to be under 60 FPS and crisp HD (even 4K) conditions. Thrid one - OBS studio  OBS is a widely welcomed software. People like it because it is totally free. If you are an advanced anchor and fully unsatisfied with the fundamental features of normal screen recorders, OBS is the solution for you. But you should beware that this recorder is hard to operate, you may need a learning curve to get accustomed to it.

Use a screen recorder! Here I recommend an easy-to-use one called RecMaster to you. It’s able to capture onscreen activity in full screen or custom area mode in one-click solution. Moreover, you can produce video with voice and webcam. Finally, it also has functions like mouse cursor effect, edit and annotation etc. You can have a try and you will feel satisfied.
